mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNS_POST ( SP_TITLE, SP_CONTENTS, SP_AUTHOR, SP_EMAIL, SP_REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{postTitle}, #{postContents}, #{author}, #{email}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT SP_TITLE AS postTitle, SP_CONTENTS AS postContents, SP_AUTHOR AS author, SP_EMAIL AS email, SP_REG_DT AS regDt FROM SNS_POST ORDER BY SP_REG_DT DESC
